name: A green squid-like tentacle
data: It decreases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users constitution somewhat.
It increases the users wisdom a tiny bit.
It increases the users intelligence somewhat.
It has little armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users poison resistance somewhat.
A death in the realm causes changes in its effects.
